column1: Kata Robata////The place is upbeat and clean
column3: and the server we had that night was affable
column6: is like Japanese Tapas. Very good sushi
column7: and the salads and meats were very tasty: light and savory
column8: but not too heavy or too salty. This is definitely an experience I would repeat. Light and tasty fare. A little on the expensive side -- the food is not 5 star
column9: but the atmosphere and the service are: should probably give them 4.5 stars.
